mapper.insert: INSERT INTO his.bill (bill_num, bill_sum, bill_type, bill_state,bill_register_id, bill_prescription_id, bill_medical_skill_id, bill_user_id,bill_fee_cat_name) VALUES (#{bill_num},#{bill_sum}, #{bill_type}, #{bill_state}, #{bill_register_id}, #{bill_prescription_id}, #{bill_medical_skill_id}, #{bill_user_id},#{bill_fee_cat_name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bill WHERE bill_user_id = #{bill_user_id} AND bill_time BETWEEN #{start_time} AND #{end_time}
SELECT * FROM bill WHERE bill_prescription_id = #{bill_prescription_id} ORDER BY bill_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: update bill set bill_num = #{bill_num} where bill_id = #{bill_id}
